Dixon's outlier test critical Q table

Source: R/data_description.R
DixonQ.Rd

Dixon's outlier test critical Q table

Usage

DixonQ

Format

An object of class data.frame with 14 rows and 2 columns.

References

DIXON, W. J. (1950) Analysis of extreme values. Ann. Math. Stat. 21, 488–506. DEAN, R. B., DIXON, W. J. (1951) Simplified statistics for small numbers of observation. Anal. Chem. 23, 636–638.

Author

Zhenglei Gao
